member.name: T:StravaClient.BasePageParameters
member.summary: Represents a page parameters for API arguments.

member.name: P:StravaClient.BasePageParameters.PerPage
member.summary: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ActivityByIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving activities by id.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ActivityStreamsAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving activity streams.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStreamsAPIArgs.Keys
member.summary: Desired stream types. May take one of the following values:

member.name: T:StravaClient.AthleteActivitiesAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving activities of an athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.AthleteActivitiesAPIArgs.Before
member.summary: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place before a certain time.

member.name: P:StravaClient.AthleteActivitiesAPIArgs.After
member.summary: An epoch timestamp to use for filtering activities that have taken place after a certain time.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ClubActivitiesByIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving club activities by id.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ClubAdminsByIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving club admin by id.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ClubMembersByIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving members of a club by id.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ClubsLoggedInAthleteAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving clubs with logged in athlete.

member.name: T:StravaClient.CommentsByActivityIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving comments by activity id.

member.name: P:StravaClient.CommentsByActivityIdAPIArgs.PageSize
member.summary: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.

member.name: P:StravaClient.CommentsByActivityIdAPIArgs.AfterCursor
member.summary: Cursor of the last item in the previous page of results, used to request the subsequent page of results. When omitted, the first page of results is fetched.

member.name: T:StravaClient.EffortsBySegmentIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving segment efforts by segment id.

member.name: P:StravaClient.EffortsBySegmentIdAPIArgs.StartDateLocal
member.summary: Start date of the effort in ISO 8601 formatted date time.

member.name: P:StravaClient.EffortsBySegmentIdAPIArgs.EndDateLocal
member.summary: End date of the effort in ISO 8601 formatted date time.

member.name: P:StravaClient.EffortsBySegmentIdAPIArgs.PerPage
member.summary: Number of items per page. Defaults to 30.

member.name: T:StravaClient.KudoersByActivityIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving kudoers by activity id.

member.name: T:StravaClient.RoutesByAthleteIdAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving routes by athlete id.

member.name: T:StravaClient.SegmentEffortStreamsAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving a set of streams for a segment effort.

member.name: P:StravaClient.SegmentEffortStreamsAPIArgs.Keys
member.summary: Desired stream types. May take one of the following values:

member.name: T:StravaClient.SegmentsExploreAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving segments explore.

member.name: P:StravaClient.SegmentsExploreAPIArgs.Bounds
member.summary: The latitude and longitude for two points describing a rectangular boundary for the search: [southwest corner latitude, southwest corner longitude, northeast corner latitude, northeast corner longitude].

member.name: P:StravaClient.SegmentsExploreAPIArgs.ActivityType
member.summary: Desired activity type. May take one of the following values: running, riding.

member.name: T:StravaClient.SegmentStreamsAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving the given segment's streams.

member.name: P:StravaClient.SegmentStreamsAPIArgs.Keys
member.summary: Desired stream types. May take one of the following values:

member.name: T:StravaClient.StarredSegmentsAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for retrieving logged in athlete starred segments.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityAPIArgs.Type
member.summary: Type of activity. For example - Run, Ride etc.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityAPIArgs.SportType
member.summary: Sport type of activity. For example - Run, MountainBikeRide, Ride, etc.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityAPIArgs.StartDateLocal
member.summary: The start date of the activity in ISO 8601 formatted date time.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityAPIArgs.ElapsedTime
member.summary: The elapsed time of the activity in seconds.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityAPIArgs.IsTrainer
member.summary: Set to 1 to mark as a trainer activity.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityAPIArgs.IsCommute
member.summary: et to 1 to mark as commute.

member.name: T:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for uploading a new data file.

member.name: P:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs.Name
member.summary: The desired name of the resulting activity.

member.name: P:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs.Description
member.summary: The desired name of the resulting activity.

member.name: P:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs.Trainer
member.summary: Whether the resulting activity should be marked as having been performed on a trainer.

member.name: P:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs.Commute
member.summary: Whether the resulting activity should be tagged as a commute.

member.name: P:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs.DataType
member.summary: The format of the uploaded file. May take one of the following values: fit, fit.gz, tcx, tcx.gz, gpx, gpx.gz .

member.name: P:StravaClient.UploadAPIArgs.ExternalId
member.summary: The desired external identifier of the resulting activity.

member.name: T:StravaClient.StarSegmentAPIArgs
member.summary: Arguments used for the star of the segment.

member.name: P:StravaClient.StarSegmentAPIArgs.IsStarred
member.summary: If true, star the segment; if false, unstar the segment.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ActivityRequestModel
member.summary: Request model used for creating and updating an activity.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityRequestModel.IsCommute
member.summary: Whether this activity is a commute.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityRequestModel.IsTrainer
member.summary: Whether this activity was recorded on a training machine.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityRequestModel.GearId
member.summary: Identifier for the gear associated with the activity. ‘none’ clears gear from activity.

member.name: T:StravaClient.RefreshTokenRequestModel
member.summary: Request model used for getting a new token.

member.name: P:StravaClient.RefreshTokenRequestModel.ClientId
member.summary: The application’s ID, obtained during registration.

member.name: P:StravaClient.RefreshTokenRequestModel.ClientSecret
member.summary: The application’s secret, obtained during registration.

member.name: P:StravaClient.RefreshTokenRequestModel.GrantType
member.summary: The grant type for the request. When refreshing an access token, must always be "refresh_token".

member.name: P:StravaClient.RefreshTokenRequestModel.RefreshToken
member.summary: The refresh token for this user, to be used to get the next access token for this user.
member.remarks: Please expect that this value can change anytime you retrieve a new access token. Once a new refresh token code has been returned, the older code will no longer work.

member.name: T:StravaClient.UpdateLoggedInAthleteRequestModel
member.summary: Request model used for updating the logged in athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.UpdateLoggedInAthleteRequestModel.Weight
member.summary: The weight of the athlete in kilograms.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.BiggestRideDistance
member.summary: The longest distance ridden by the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.BiggestClimbElevationGain
member.summary: The highest climb ridden by the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.RecentRideTotals
member.summary: The recent (last 4 weeks) ride stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.RecentRunTotals
member.summary: The recent (last 4 weeks) run stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.RecentSwimTotals
member.summary: The recent (last 4 weeks) swim stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.YtdRideTotals
member.summary: The year to date ride stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.YtdRunTotals
member.summary: The year to date run stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.YtdSwimTotals
member.summary: The year to date swim stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.AllRideTotals
member.summary: The all time ride stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.AllRunTotals
member.summary: The all time run stats for the athlete.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityStatsResponseModel.AllSwimTotals
member.summary: The all time swim stats for the athlete.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel
member.remarks: A roll-up of metrics pertaining to a set of activities. Values are in seconds and meters.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel.Count
member.summary: The number of activities considered in this total.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel.Distance
member.summary: The total distance covered by the considered activities.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel.MovingTime
member.summary: The total moving time of the considered activities.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel.ElapsedTime
member.summary: The total elapsed time of the considered activities.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel.ElevationGain
member.summary: The total elevation gain of the considered activities.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityTotalResponseModel.AchievementCount
member.summary: The total number of achievements of the considered activities.

member.name: T:StravaClient.ActivityZoneResponseModel
member.summary: Represents an activity zone response model.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityZoneResponseModel.DistributionBuckets
member.remarks: A collection of TimedZoneRange objects. Stores the exclusive ranges representing zones and the time spent in each.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ActivityZoneResponseModel.Type
member.summary: May take one of the following values: heartrate, power.

member.name: P:StravaClient.ClubActivityResponseModel.ResourceState
member.summary: Resource state, indicates level of detail.
member.remarks: Possible values: 1 -> "meta", 2 -> "summary", 3 -> "detail".

member.summary: The activity's moving time, in seconds.

member.summary: The activity's elapsed time, in seconds.

member.summary: Resource state, indicates level of detail.

member.summary: The category of the climb [0, 5]. Higher is harder.
member.remarks: ie. 5 is Hors catégorie, 0 is uncategorized in climb_category. If climb_category = 5, climb_category_desc = HC. If climb_category = 2, climb_category_desc = 3.

member.summary: The description for the category of the climb.
member.remarks: May take one of the following values: NC, 4, 3, 2, 1, HC.

members.member:
This route's sub-type.
(1 for road, 2 for mountain bike, 3 for cross, 4 for trail, 5 for mixed).

member.summary: The number of seconds since the epoch when the provided access token will expire.

member.summary: Seconds until the short-lived access token will expire.

member.name: P:StravaClient.RefreshTokenResponseModel.RefreshToken
member.summary: The refresh token for this user, to be used to get the next access token for this user.
member.remarks: Please expect that this value can change anytime you retrieve a new access token. Once a new refresh token code has been returned, the older code will no longer work.
